# [Framer](https://framer.com)

Framer Provider
Design how it works. Framer is an all-in-one tool that
helps teams design every part of the product experience.

## Implementation Details

- Provider
Name: Framer
- Documentation: NONE
- HTTPS support: YES
- Fake Response: NO
- Oembed Params: maxwidth , maxheight
- Supported Hosts: framer.com
- Responsive response: NO
- Collections: DefaultProviderCollection
